abstract.t: This document specifies an authentication scheme for the Telnetprotocol under the framework described in [1], using the SecureRemote Password Protocol (SRP) authentication mechanism. Thespecific mechanism, SRP-SHA1, is described in [RFC2945].This document updates a previous specification of the TelnetAuthentication SRP method, RFC 2944, to allow SRP Telnet authenticationto be used in conjunction with the START_TLS option [2].
